-A.Description: If present, list the requested object(s) across all namespaces. Namespace in current context is ignored even if specified with --namespace.

--all-namespaces=false.Description: If present, list the requested object(s) across all namespaces. Namespace in current context is ignored even if specified with --namespace.

--chunk-size=500.Description: Return large lists in chunks rather than all at once. Pass 0 to disable. This flag is beta and may change in the future.

-f.Description: Filename, directory, or URL to files containing the resource to describe

--filename=[].Description: Filename, directory, or URL to files containing the resource to describe

-k.Description: Process the kustomization directory. This flag can't be used together with -f or -R.

--kustomize=''.Description: Process the kustomization directory. This flag can't be used together with -f or -R.

-R.Description: Process the directory used in -f, --filename recursively. Useful when you want to manage related manifests organized within the same directory.

--recursive=false.Description: Process the directory used in -f, --filename recursively. Useful when you want to manage related manifests organized within the same directory.

-l.Description: Selector (label query) to filter on, supports '=', '==', and '!='.(e.g. -l key1=value1,key2=value2)

--selector=''.Description: Selector (label query) to filter on, supports '=', '==', and '!='.(e.g. -l key1=value1,key2=value2)

--show-events=true.Description: If true, display events related to the described object.
